thread.title: Rugby World Cup 2015 - Exclusive 40-page magazine and wallchart
thread.title_full: Rugby World Cup 2015 - Exclusive 40-page magazine and wallchart - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Rugby World Cup 2015 - Exclusive 40-page magazine and wallchart
text: Don't miss your exclusive guide to the Rugby World Cup this weekend. Readers can claim a 40-page rugby magazine with Saturday's paper, and a double-sided wallchart on Sunday, to keep up to date as the tournament progresses. The highlights of the magazine include: -Will Greenwood on how to win the World Cup, and why this is going to be a great tournament -An exclusive interview by Mick Cleary with Stuart Lancaster, England's coach -New Zealand great Zinzan Brooke on how the All Blacks can win the World Cup away from home for the first time -Guides to all 20 teams including squad lists -Sir Ian McGeechan's tactical guide, plus graphics, on how the 10 biggest teams will play -Brian Moore, who played in the first three World Cups, on how the tournament has changed -Steve James on whether the other home nations can finally live up to their promise at a World Cup -A fill-in fixture chart -A guide to all the venues. How to claim See the newspaper on Saturday, September 12 for your 40-page magazine, and on Sunday, September 13 for your exclusive wallchart. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
